title: The Writer's Almanac -  Sunday, January 26, 2020
description: It's the birthday of songwriter Lucinda Williams (1953), whose advice to artists includes a warning against inscrutability: “Offer your art up to the whole world, not just an elite few."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of songwriter Lucinda Williams (1953), whose advice to artists includes a warning against inscrutability: “Offer your art up to the whole world, not just an elite few."
